Top Shopify Store Services

Build a online store for your busines

Let our Shopify Experts take care of everything for you from store design to product and inventory set-up, payment and shipping. Our Shopify development services help brands stay competitive, stay at the forefront of innovation, and overcome challenges in the e-commerce era. We create high-performing solutions that meet the demands of the e-commerce era.

Goal planning

Great service

100% guaranteed

What's in the app?

Shopify Website Development

The purpose of Shopify custom development is to help you incorporate your ideas and concepts into the digital frame of your store. This can include anything from tweaking functionality and performance to major updates, migration orders, and app integration.

Get Started
App key features

Shopify Development Services & Solutions

Shopify Store Development

We design Shopify website from scratch and add any additional features that you require. Our Shopify website development service caters to all your E-Commerce development needs.

Shopify Store Migration

With help LitExtension we provide the most accurate and seamless data migration from 140+ platforms to Shopify. LitExtension can ensure no downtime during and after your Shopify migration.

Shopify Themes Development

We provide full-featured, responsive Shopify themes that are mobile-friendly and easy to customize. Our Shopify themes are designed to help increase conversion rates and boost sales.

Shopify Custom Graphices

We provide bespoke solutions that are tailored to your business Graphices needs. Custom graphics are now essential for eCommerce brands aiming to boost conversions.

Shopify Maintenance Service

Our Shopify experts are here to make sure that your eCommerce store perform at the most optimum effectiveness and performance.

Shopify Integration

This service allows sellers to easily list and sync your Shopify products across sales channel and effectively manage all orders from one dashboard.
How it works

4 steps to financial success

General Project Discussion

We will discuss your options regarding niche and range of products to be sold on your store. I can provide suggestions or go with your existing plans. We will also decide on the store name and domain.

Website Set-Up

We will create your store via our Shopify Developer account or via the access of your existing account. Following, the first steps include backend set-up such as policy pages, plugins, settings etc.

Branding & Content Optimization

We will start creating your brand image including a professional logo design, optimized images, videos, mock-ups and banners all specific to your Shopify store.

Project Delivery & Review

We will then deliver the store to you in full once all previous steps are met and everything is completed to your standards. Here you will be able to leave feedback and request changes if necessary.

Contact us

Get closer with us

FAQ's

Frequently Asked Questions

Will we provide premium themes ?
Yes, We have many premium themes to choose from. And we will not charge for these themes separately.
Will you provide Hot & Trending Products for my dropshipping store?
Yes definitely, I will add the most winning and hots product which can be marketable and scale-able instantly that can help you to make money.
Can I contact you after you have built my Shopify store in case I have questions?
Absolutely, we provide lifetime support exclusively. Just contact us and we will reply as soon as possible.
How much of my engagement is expected?
We understand that our clients are very busy and don’t have time to work on the new theme. I will keep you updated as we move on but required your minimal engagement.
What do you need from me to get started?
First of all, Your Shopify URL. Lastly, I’ll need a clear job description. It’s important for me to understand the job clearly in order to deliver exactly what you want.
Will you do niche research?
Yes, We will recommend a few most profitable niches wherein we keep testing new and hot selling products in-house. If you have any niche in mind then we can do that as well.
Will you create a logo for my store?
Yes, A complimentary and professional logo is included with the store.
